title: brew goes into infinite recursion...

labels.name: outdated
labels.description: PR was locked due to age

body:
### `brew config` output

```shell
brew config 2>&1 /dev/null

HOMEBREW_VERSION: 3.6.2-6-g8de3e93
ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew
HEAD: 8de3e93715d6c19529d5d5aa7cbb10f20d947096
Last commit: 12 hours ago
Core tap ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core
Core tap HEAD: c1b0e95c0069cb2a49fac440301d0d7c8125c557
Core tap last commit: 51 minutes ago
Core tap branch: master
HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew
HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: []
HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: 1
Homebrew Ruby: 2.6.8 => /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/2.6.8_1/bin/ruby
CPU: single-core 64-bit unknown_0x6_0x5c

without the /dev/null redirect:

HOMEBREW_VERSION: 3.6.2-6-g8de3e93
ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew
HEAD: 8de3e93715d6c19529d5d5aa7cbb10f20d947096
Last commit: 12 hours ago
Core tap ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core
Core tap HEAD: c1b0e95c0069cb2a49fac440301d0d7c8125c557
Core tap last commit: 52 minutes ago
Core tap branch: master
HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew
HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: []
Error: stack level too deep
Please report this issue:
  https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/2.6.8_1/lib/ruby/2.6.0/pathname.rb:42:in `chop_basename'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/2.6.8_1/lib/ruby/2.6.0/pathname.rb:359:in `plus'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/2.6.8_1/lib/ruby/2.6.0/pathname.rb:351:in `+'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:83:in `block in gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:38:in `system_gcc_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:33:in `build_system_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:11:in `block in locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:84:in `block in gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:38:in `system_gcc_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:33:in `build_system_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:11:in `block in locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:84:in `block in gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:38:in `system_gcc_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:33:in `build_system_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:11:in `block in locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `locate'
....
```


### `brew doctor` output

```shell
Error: stack level too deep
Please report this issue:
  https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting

/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `locate'

/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:33:in `build_system_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:11:in `block in locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:84:in `block in gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:38:in `system_gcc_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:33:in `build_system_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:11:in `block in locate'
```

### Verification

- [X] I ran `brew update` and am still able to reproduce my issue.
- [X] I have resolved all warnings from `brew doctor` and that did not fix my problem.

### What were you trying to do (and why)?

I was trying to run brew install gcc as part of a fresh install.



### What happened (include all command output)?

(Î»=0) hays@clio2 ~ $ brew install gcc 2>&1 | more
Error: stack level too deep
Please report this issue:
  https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:38:in `system_gcc_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:33:in `build_system_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:11:in `block in locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:84:in `block in gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:38:in `system_gcc_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:33:in `build_system_too_old?'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:11:in `block in locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `fetch'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/extend/os/linux/development_tools.rb:10:in `locate'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:84:in `block in gcc_version'
/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/development_tools.rb:82:in `fetch'
...

### What did you expect to happen?

Installation of gcc.

### Step-by-step reproduction instructions (by running `brew` commands)

```shell
This happened on a non-fresh install when I did a brew update. I did a fresh install and now it does it on brew install gcc.
```
